page.title: 19Caldicot-Waghausel
page.content: For more than ten years Caldicot has had a twinning connection with a town in Germany. The first contact was with Wiesental near Heidleberg and Bruchsal in South Germany. When Germany underwent local government boundary changes Wiesental joined with the villages of Kirlach and Waghausel. There are many exchanges made by members of associations such as youth clubs, sports clubs, choirs and bands. Visitors from Germany stay with local families in Caldicot and are able to visit places of historic interest and join in social events. This arrangement has helped to build up social, cultural and trade relations between the people of Caldicot and Waghausel.
